item.title: Skillcape button
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:6, topic:400468”][quote author=mistakengod link=topic=497544.msg3638386#msg3638386 date=1308769114]
all other server gives fucking errors to me lol.
only this one is working, cause someone helped me to get on lol ;p .

well i’ve got the skillcape.jpg in a map but there just isn’t a button in the emotescreen lol
[/quote]
You have skillcape.jpg in a map? What are you talking about kid, just search for a new client and server combination that have them pre loaded or learn how to load new sprites.[/quote]

I agree with Andrew =d. Also… clicked the link… FML. WTF is up with Sponge Bob lmao =.=".
